body:
Nit: Mind using braces here to keep in line with the style guide?
(https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html#s4.1.1-braces-always-used)

Actually, it might be easier if you just run the [`google-java-format`](https://github.com/google/google-java-format) tool on all files - that way we don't have to debate any formatting preferences :)
